snippet.title: The Old Barn: A Short Narrative Experience
snippet.description:
Introducing The Old Barn – A New PC Game for a Great Cause! 🏠

The Old Barn encourages you to explore a cozy old barn while listening to the musings of the narrator as she recalls growing up in the barn. It was created in Unreal Engine 5 and features a highly detailed environment filled with 3D scanned items. 🎮

The best part? It's only $5, and all proceeds go directly to Doctors Without Borders to support their vital work around the globe.

Explore the barn here: https://breach-vr.itch.io/the-old-barn

#narrative #unrealengine5 #ue5 #gaming
